      Board scoring
      - 2 point for each checker on the board (NOT KING, NOT ABOUT TO KING)
      - 3 points for each checker on the board about to king
      - 4 points for each king
      - add points for the longest capture chain

      • evaluateForPlayingBlack

        public int evaluateForPlayingBlack(int player)
        Board scoring
        - 2 point for each checker on the board (NOT KING, NOT ABOUT TO KING)
        - 3 points for each checker on the board about to king
        - 4 points for each king
        - add points for the longest capture chain
        Parameters:
        player - CheckersConstants.BLACK or CheckersConstants.WHITE
        Returns:
        score

      • evaluateForPlayingWhite

        public int evaluateForPlayingWhite(int player)
        Board scoring
        - 2 point for each checker on the board (NOT KING, NOT ABOUT TO KING)
        - 3 points for each checker on the board about to king
        - 4 points for each king
        - add points for the longest capture chain
        Parameters:
        player - CheckersConstants.BLACK or CheckersConstants.WHITE
        Returns:
        score
